Race.SpecificTitle: Road Dist. No. 2 Prop.#1 -- 13.26 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District No. Two Propositions
Proposition No. 1 
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 13.26 mills property tax renewal for maintaining Parish roads and bridges within Road District No. Two.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. Two, Vernon Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a thirteen and twenty-six hundredths (13.26) mills tax on all of the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $119,340 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022, for the purpose of maintaining Parish roads and bridges within the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road Dist. No. 2 Prop.#2 -- 2.04 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District No. Two Propositions
Proposition No. 2 
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 2.04 mills property tax renewal for constructing and improving Parish roads and bridges within Road District No. Two.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. Two, Vernon Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a two and four hundredths (2.04) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $18,360 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022, for the purpose of constructing and improving Parish roads and bridges within the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road Dist. No. 6 Prop.#1 -- 15.75 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District No. Six Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Tax Continuation)

Summary:  10 year, 15.75 mills property tax continuation for maintaining Parish roads and bridges within Road District No. Six.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. Six, Vernon Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a fifteen and seventy-five hundredths (15.75) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $51,725 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022, for the purpose of maintaining Parish roads and bridges within the District, said millage to represent a two hundredths of a mill (.02) increase over the 15.73 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2012 pursuant to an election held on April 5, 2003?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road Dist. No. 6 Prop.#2 -- 2.10 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District No. Six Propositions
Proposition No. 2 
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  2.10 mills property tax renewal for a period of 10 years for constructing and improving parish roads and bridges within the District.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. Six, Vernon Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a two and ten hundredths (2.10) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $6,890 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022, for the purpose of constructing and improving Parish roads and bridges within the District?
